title: Chop Chop
typeOfFood: International, Fast food, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Build your own meal by choosing your noodles (all are vegan), sauce (such as vegan peanut butter, red or green curry), and a topping (vegans could get tofu or mushroom mix, and various vegetables). Offers Asian-influenced cocktails such as lychee cosmopolitan and mango-chili margarita.
